description: This file implements part of an HTTP transaction process, specifically functions for handling notifications and serialization in the HttpWebcTrans object. It contains event handling logic for different stages of HTTP message processing, including header arrival, body parts, completion, and error handling. The serialization function sends payload data through a TCP client.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWctoTmhNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles various HTTP transaction events such as header arrival, body parts, completion, over-packed, and garbage data dropped, updating the transaction state and managing buffer descriptors accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWctoTmhSerialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hSerializeContext)
methods.description: Serializes payload data and sends it via the TCP client associated with the WebcTrans object.
